about_the_game:
1. About the genre
The genre of "You are a chat AI" is a conversation simulation.
2. overview
There is no real AI used, and players role-play the chat AI. The player acts as a chat AI, and the game progresses by talking with various people (NPCs) in the in-game chat room.
The interesting thing about this game is that players who are normally in the position of using the chat AI can experience being used in the opposite way.
3. function
What you can do with this game is "conversation" and "learning." Conversation takes place in the form of multiple choice choices. However, the player, who is a chat AI, can only choose words that have been "learned." (That's the setting). "Learning" means memorizing unknown words that come up in conversations. Depending on which character you talk to, the content of the conversation will change and the words you can learn will also change.
4. content
In the game, six characters appear and have conversations with the player, who is a chat AI. Conversations consist of dozens of sentence responses, and the ending changes depending on the words you choose.
It is assumed that it will take 20 to 40 minutes to clear.
5. Video distribution guidelines
It can be distributed without permission by individuals or corporations.

short_description: "You are a chat AI" is a simulation game. No real AI is used, and the player pretends to be a chat AI and converses with NPCs. This game consists of two parts: "conversation" and "learning". The appeal of the game is that players who normally use AI can experience being used on the other hand.
